saśailavanadhātrīṇāṃ yathādhāro ’hināyakaḥ/
sarveṣāṃ yogatantrāṇāṃ tathādhāro hi kuṇḍalī//
suptā guruprasādena /
pi sarvapadmāni bhidyante granthayo’pi ca//
prāṇasya śūnyapadavī
rājapathāyate/
tathā cittaṃ nirālambaṃ kālasya vañcanam//
suṣumṇā śūnyapadavī brahmarandhraṃmahā/
śmaśāne śāmbhavī madhyamārgaś cety eka//
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena īśvaraṃ/
brahmadvāramukhe suptāṃ mudrā//
mahāmudrā mahābandho mahāvedhaś ca khecarī/
mūla jālandharābhidhaḥ//
karaṇī viparītākhyā vajro śakticālanam/
daśakaṃ jarāmaraṇanāśanam//
ādīśvaroditaṃ divyam aṣṭaiśvaryapradāyakam/
vallabhaṃ sarvasiddhānāṃ durlabhaṃ marutām api//
gopanīyaṃ prayatnena yathā ratnakaraṇḍakam/
kasyacin naiva vaktavyaṃ kulastrīsurataṃ yathā//
pādamūlena vāmena yoniṃ saṃpīḍya dakṣiṇam/
pādaṃ prasāritaṃ kṛtvā karābhyāṃ pūrayemukham//
kaṇṭhe bandhaṃ samāropya dhānayedd vāyum ūrdhvataḥ/
yathā sarpo daṇḍākāraḥ prajāyate//
ṛjvībhūtā tathā śakti kuṇḍalī sahasā bhavet/
tathāsau maraṇāvasthāṃ harate dvipuṭāśrayā//
tataḥ śanaiḥ śanair eva recayen na tu vegataḥ/
iyaṃ khalu mahāmudrā mahāsiddhaiḥ praśasyate//
mahākleśā mahā doṣā jīryante maraṇādayaḥ/
mahā ca vadanti ttamāḥ//
candrāṃśaṃ tu samabhyasya sūryāṃśaṃ tu samabhyaset/
yāvatayor bhavesāmyaṃ tato mudrāṃ visaryayet//
na hi pathyam apathyaṃ vā rasāḥ sarve’pi nīrasāḥ/
api bhuktaṃ viṣaṃ ghoraṃ pīyūṣam iva jīrjyate//
kṣayakuṣṭhamudāvartagulmājīrṇajvarās tathā/
tasya doṣāḥ kṣayaṃ yānti mahāmudrāṃ tu yo’bhyaset//
kathiteyaṃ mahāmudrā jarāmṛtyuvināśinī/
gopanīyā prayatnena na deyā yasya kasyacit//
pārṣṇiṃ vāmasya pādasya yonisthāne niyojayet/
vāmorūpari saṃsthāpya dakṣiṇaṃ caraṇaṃ tathā//
pūrayitvā vāyuṃ hṛdaye cibukaṃ dṛḍham/
niṣpīḍya yonim ākuñcya mano madhye niyojayet//
//

ayaṃ khalu mahābandho mahāsiddhipradāyakaḥ/
kālapāśamahābandhavimocanavicakṣaṇaḥ//
ayaṃ ca sarvanāḍīnām ūrdhvaṃ/
triveṇīsaṅgamaṃ dhatte kedāraṃ prāpayen manaḥ//
rūpalāvaṇyasaṃyuktā yathā nārī patiṃ vinā/
mahāmudrāmahā //
sthito yogī kṛtvā pūrakaekadhā/
gatim āvṛtya nibhṛtaṃ kaṇṭhamudrayā//
samahastayugo bhūmau saṃtāḍayec chanaiḥ/
puṭadvayaṃ samākramya sphurati madhyagaḥ/
bandhenānena sādhayet sarvam īpsitam//
somasūryāgni jāyate /
mṛtāvasthā samutpannā tato //
mahāvedho’yaanabhyāsān mahāsiddhipradāyakaḥ/
valīpalitaghnaḥ sevyate sādhakottamaiḥ//
etat trayaṃ mahā jarāmṛtyuvināśanam/
vahnivṛddhikaraṃ aṇimādiguṇapradam//

samyakśikṣāvatā svalpaṃ prathama/
vahnistrīpathasevānām ādau varjana//
chedana /
bhrūmadhya spṛśati tadā khecarī bhavati//
kapālakuhare jihvā praviṣṭā viparītagā/
bhruvor antargatā dṛṣṭir mudrā bhavati khecarī//
kalāṃ parāṅmukhīṃ parivarjayet/
bhat ṣecarī mudrā vyomacakraṃ tad ucyate/
rasanām ūrdhvagāṃ kṛtvā
kṣaṇārdhaṃ yadi tiṣṭhati/
mucyate yogī vyādhimṛtyujarādibhiḥ//
na rogo maraṇaṃ tasya na nidrā na tṛṣā kṣudhā/
na ca mūrchā bhavet tasya yo mudrāṃ vetti khecarīm//
citte carati khe yasmāj jihvā carati khe gatā/
khecarī mudrā siddhair namaskṛtā//
khecaryā mudritaṃ yena vivaraṃ lambikordhvataḥ/
kṣarate binduḥ kāminyāśleṣitasya ca//
calate’pi yadā binduḥ saṃprāptaś ca hutāśanam/
vrajaty ūrdhvaṃ hi tadbhuktyāviruddhe mudrayā//

māsārdhena na saṃdeho mṛtyuṃ jayati yogavit//
nityaṃ somakalāpūrṇaṃ śarīraṃ yasya /
takṣakeṇāpi daṣṭasya viṣaṃ tasya na sarpati//
indhanāni yathā vahnis tailavartiṃ ca dīpakaḥ/
tathā somakalāpūrṇaṃ dehī dehaṃ //
gomāṃsa bhakṣayen nityaṃ pibed amaravāruṇīm/
kulīnaṃ tam ahaṃ manye kulaghātakāḥ//
gośabdenoditā jihvā tatpraveśo hi tāluni/
gomāṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam//

tatkallola vimalaṃ dhārāmṛtaṃ yaḥ pibet
nirdoṣaḥ sa mṛṇālakomalar yogī ciraṃ jīvati//
cumbantī yadi lambikāgram aniśaṃ jihvā rasasyandinī
sākṣārā dugdhasādṛśī madhvājyatulyā/
vyādhīnāṃ haraṇaṃ jvarāntakaraṇaṃ
tasya syād amaratvam aṣṭaguṇitaṃsiddhāṅgaṇākarṣaṇam//
ekaṃ sṛṣṭimayaṃ bījaṃ ekā mudrā ca khecarī/
eko devo vasthā manonmanī//
pārṣṇibhāgena saṃpīḍya yonim ākuñcayed gudam/
apānam ūrdhvam ākṛṣya mūlabandho’yam ucyate//
ūrdhvagaṃ kurute /
ākuñcanena ta prāhur mūlabandhaṃ yoginaḥ//
gudaṃ saṃpīḍya kuñcayed balāt/
vāraṃ vāraṃ cordhvaṃ samāyāti samīraṇaḥ//
prāṇāpānau nādabindū mūlabandhena caikatām/
gatvā yogasya saṃsiddhiṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ//
apānaprāṇayor aikyaṃ kṣayo mūtrapurīṣayoḥ/
yuvā bhavati vṛddho’pi satataṃ mūlabandhataḥ//
apāne cordhvage yāte /
tadānalaśikhā dīrghā //
tato prāṇamukta svarūpakam/
pradīptas tu jvalano dehajas tathā//
tena kuṇḍalinī suptā sānubodhyate/
daṇḍāhatā bhujaṅgīva niścitam ṛjutāṃ vrajet//
bilaṃ praviṣṭeva tato brahmanāḍyantaraṃ vrajet/
tasmān nityaṃ mūlabandhaḥ kartavyo yogibhiḥ sadā//
baddho yena suṣumṇāyāṃ prāṇas tūḍḍīyate yataḥ/
tasmād uḍḍīyanākhyo’yaṃ yogibhiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ//
kurute yasmād a mahākhagaḥ/
taevaṃ syā bandho ’bhidhīyate//
udare paścime tānaṃ nābher ūrdhvaṃ ca kārayet/
uḍḍiyāno ayaṃ bandho mṛtyumātaṅgakesarī//
uḍḍiyānaṃ tu sahajaṃ guruṇā kathitaṃ /
abhyase vṛddho’pi //
nābher ūrdhvam adhaś cāpi kuryāt prayatnataḥ/
ṣaṇmāsaabhyasenin mṛtyuṃ jayaty eva na saṃśayaḥ//
sati vajrāsane pādau karābhyāṃ dhārayed dṛḍham/
gulphadeśasamīpaṃ tu kaṃdhaṃ //
paścimaṃ tāna kārayeudare hṛdi/
śanaiḥ śanair yathā s tundasaṃdhiṃ gacchati//
sarveṣām eva bandhānām uttamo /
uḍḍiyāne dṛḍhe bandhe bhavet//
kaṇṭham ākuñcya hṛdaye sthāpaye/
bandho jālandharākhyo’yaṃ amṛtākṣayakārakaḥ//
śirājāla nabhojalam/
tato jālandharo bandhaḥ duḥkhaughanāśanaḥ//
jālandhare kṛte bandhe kaṇṭhasaṃkocalakṣaṇe/
na pīyūṣaṃ prayātyty agnau na ca vāyuḥ //
kaṇṭhasaṃkocanenaiva dhruvam/
m idaṃ jñeyaṃ ṣoḍaśādhārabandhanam//
bandhatrayam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ /
sarveṣāṃ tantrāṇāṃ sādhanaṃ yogino viduḥ//
mūlasthānaṃ tu kārayet/
baddhvā vāhaye patham//
